title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: Scrilla provides aspiring devs and Defi projects access to early-stage funding, contract help, or marketing support.  Scrilla is a revolutionary platform that connects developers with the resources they need to launch successful projects.In just 90 minutes, Scrilla's presale was able to raise 150 ETH, a testament to the strength of their community and the potential of the platform. Scrilla has HUGE marketing plans in the works, including a major Facebook push, NFT promotions, and partnerships with some of the biggest names in the industry.It's not just about marketing. Scrilla is dedicated to providing real value to developers who are passionate about their projects. Whether you need funding, contract help, utility, or marketing support, Scrilla has you covered. They are  committed to providing comprehensive resources to help you take your project to the next level.Already, they have seen support from major influencers and leaders in the space. YouTubers have already posted about Scrilla, and more are on the way. They are already in talks with LBank, Bitmart and other exchange partnerships meaning you'll soon be able to trade Scrilla tokens on some of the most popular platforms out there.And the best part? They are  just getting started. ONLY ONE WEEK OLD.  They have already been listed on CMC and CG is on the way.Scrilla is constantly looking for new partnerships and opportunities to grow the community and support developers who are passionate about their projects. With Scrilla, you don't just get access to funding and resources - you become part of a vibrant community that's dedicated to driving innovation in the crypto space.So if you're a developer with a great idea, or a crypto enthusiast looking for the next big thing, look no further than Scrilla. They are here to help you achieve your goals and take your projects to the moon.Chart: https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0x7493341c10f28d25a3aa12e07d9a0c7b4520c963Website : Scrill.laTwitter: https://twitter.com/Scrilla2BillaCMC: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/scrilla/TG: https://t.me/ScrillaETHDiscord: https://discord.gg/vgVsQjV4gJEmail: team@scrill.laWhitepaper: https://scrill.la/whitepaper.pdf[/b]
